tasks.task_description: Create proper Dashboard Overview page at /dashboard
Update sidebar routing for correct navigation
Create content detail modal with full features

description: NtumiaHub Dashboard Implementation - Fix critical structure issues and implement missing features
context: Created proper Dashboard Overview page with stats cards, recent activity, storage quota, and quick actions. Moved original marketplace content to /dashboard/marketplace route. Sidebar routing is already correct.

Completed Phase 2 - Created all missing core pages: My Uploads with stats and table, Team Management with member management, History with upload/download tabs, and Settings with comprehensive configuration options. All pages follow the established design patterns.

Completed Phase 3 - Enhanced Marketplace with all missing features: grid/list toggle, comprehensive filters sidebar with type and category filtering, search functionality with real-time filtering, sort dropdown with multiple options, and created a full-featured content detail modal with metadata, preview, download options, rating system, comments, and related content suggestions. All components are fully integrated and functional.
